pages.text: This brings to being many mythical creatures and the gods that made them.

Craft a mirror and an altar that aligns to the god of choice (some not yet implemented). Use the mirror to see your favor with each god and the items/mobs that you need to offer, kill, or save to gain all manner of benefits!
World structures, mobs with great loot that can be crafted into powerful artifacts, mini-bosses, summonable bosses, gods favor effects!
